LanguageData.MooMF_SettingsLabel: Moo's Mythic Framework Settings and Controls
LanguageData.MooMF_FlagNotifyItemCreation: Notify player when mythic item is created.
LanguageData.MooMF_FlagMythicOwnersCanCreateNewMythic: Mythic Item Owners Can Create New Mythic Items
Disabled by default due to balance concerns
LanguageData.MooMF_MaxMythicItemsProducedPerColony: Max Mythic Items Produced Per Colony:
LanguageData.MooMF_MinLevelForSkillItems: Minimum level for skill-based mythic items.
LanguageData.MooMF_MinLevelForSkillItemsToolTip: Upon leveling up a skill, the mod will try to create a mythic item if the new level is at least this value. Only creates an item once per skill per pawn.
LanguageData.MooMF_MaxItemOccurenceTooltip: This value controls how many times a mythic item can show up in any capacity (as a quest reward, as a random shop item, etc) before it is removed from the saved list of mythic items. If set to 0, then mythic items won't be removed unless the total mythic item save limit is reached, in which case the oldest items are removed first.
LanguageData.MooMF_CreateRandomItemsIfNeeded: Create Random Mythic Items If Needed
LanguageData.MooMF_CreateRandomItemsIfNeededToolTip: If this is enabled, and the game tries to make a mythic items but finds no valid saved options, create a random mythic item based on some hard-coded preset options.
LanguageData.MooMF_ClearSavedItemsButtonPressed: Reset button pressed. Removing all cached mythic items, and clearing the mythic item save file
LanguageData.MooMF_FailedToCreateMIFromDebug: Tried to place a saved mythic item via debug actions, but failed to create one. There's probably no saved mythic items right now.
LanguageData.MooMF_CreatedNewItemMessage: Congragulations! Because {0}, their {1} become a mythic item called "{2}"!
LanguageData.MooMF_NoMythicReasonGiven: {0} did something impressive (it's unclear what and this is probably either a bug or a debug action)
LanguageData.MooMF_RecipeRequiresHediffs: {0} cannot {1} because it requires the worker to have a specific mythic item ability affecting them.
LanguageData.MooMF_MineralsProspectedLetterText: The mythical wisdom of an ancient mining expert has divined the location of an underground deposit of {0}. You'll still need the usual equipment to find it though.
LanguageData.MooMF_RequestMythicItemDialogOption: Request mythic item location for {0} silver and {1} goodwill.
LanguageData.MooMF_MythicItemRequestedDialogFollowUp: The {0} recites an old story about ancient heroes of the Rim. Supposedly the events from those stories transpired nearby, and the {0} is convinced that you'll find something there.
